P120565.project_name: Afghanistan - Support to Basic Package of Health Services (Strengthening Health Activity for Rural Poor

keywords.cdata: Antenatal Care, child health, child health services, community health, community health workers, drugs, female, health facilities, Health Management, health posts, HEALTH SERVICES, maternal and child health, NUTRITION, nutritional status, Patient, Postnatal Care, Public Health, Social Development, workers

project_abstract.cdata: The development objective of the Support to Basic Package of Health Services (BPHS) Project for Afghanistan is to improve the health and nutritional status of the people of Afghanistan, with a greater focus on women and children by increasing accessibility and quality of the BPHS in the provinces of Balkh and Samangan and urban Kabul. This restructuring will bring the following changes: (i) extension of the closing date of the project from March 14, 2014 to September 15, 2014; and (ii) extension of the original grant closing date from March 14, 2013 to March 14, 2014.
